// src/api/nytimes.js
import axios from"axios";const API_KEY="2AeCG5EvH9bqHPhs9XYJbc4kd06GEeSq";export async function fetchTopStories(){let section=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"home";try{const response=await axios.get("https://api.nytimes.com/svc/topstories/v2/".concat(section,".json"),{params:{"api-key":API_KEY}});return response.data.results;}catch(error){console.error("Errore fetchTopStories:",error);throw error;}}
